name: Hul√¨ The Mage
description: Are you looking for a game both relaxing and adrenalinic? A weird plot with lots of NPCs and monsters to slay? Then, this is the game you are looking for. Beware! Do not get fooled by the nice and happy graphics, it is not as easy as you may think.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 570 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 5 GB available space
